answers.answer: My whole face felt like that so my doctor tested me for preeclampsia thank God I don't have it tho

question: I'm currently in my 3rd trimester of pregnancy and two days ago I woke up and the right side of my face was extremely numb and feels like it's getting heavy , have any of you other moms or first time mommies dealt with a similar situation if so how did you get rid of it and if you still had to work did the doctor keep you on bed rest or where you able to return back to work I need answers THANKS
